scripts.pretest: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && rollup --banner "$(preamble)" -f umd -g d3-dsv:d3 -n d3 -o dist/d3-fetch.js -- index.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs --preamble "$(preamble)" dist/d3-fetch.js -c -m -o dist/d3-fetch.min.js
scripts.postpublish: VERSION=`node -e 'console.log(require("./package.json").version)'`; git push && git push --tags && cd ../d3.github.com && git pull && cp ../d3-fetch/dist/d3-fetch.js d3-fetch.v0.js && cp ../d3-fetch/dist/d3-fetch.min.js d3-fetch.v0.min.js && git add d3-fetch.v0.js d3-fetch.v0.min.js && git commit -m "d3-fetch ${VERSION}" && git push && cd - && zip -j dist/d3-fetch.zip -- LICENSE README.md dist/d3-fetch.js dist/d3-fetch.min.js
